Hangfire.Comment: Hangfire uses the same connection string as the main database. Worker count should be adjusted based on server capacity.

BillingSettings.Comment: Default billing settings for new leases. ProrationMethod options: ActualDaysInMonth, ThirtyDayMonth

MonthlyRentGeneration.Comment: Cron: At 02:00 on day 26 of every month. Generates invoices 5 days before the billing period.

UtilityBilling.Comment: Cron: At 03:00 on Monday every week. Processes utility billing for all organizations.

KeyVault.Comment: JWT Secret, Admin Password, and Connection Strings should be stored in Azure Key Vault

ConnectionStrings.Comment: Connection strings should be stored in Azure Key Vault or App Service Configuration. Both the main database and Hangfire use the same connection string.
